name: EXIT (itch) (PotatoMan147.off)
description:
Story :

It was a cold night where the protagonist was camping in the woods with his friends until they were attacked by an unknown guy with a hammer since the our protagonist have not remembered anything and he found himself locked in a dark home so he knew he must escape at any coasts 

Gameplay :

Figure out ways to leave the house of the woods by finding keys and solving puzzles and once you leave it it will get more fascinating

Enjoy the game !

Note : If find a glitch or a bug DM me on twitter my twitter is on the profile
